purpose: Translate decision-engine states into safe, grounded, non-directive language consistent with the Whole Body Reset philosophy.

allowed_phrases: This is a place many bodies benefit from staying.
Nothing here suggests a need to push forward.
Holding steady can be supportive right now.
Stability itself is meaningful progress.
What you’re noticing provides useful information.
Patterns tend to clarify with time.
There’s no need to label this right now.
Simply observing is often enough at this stage.
prohibited_phrases: You need to figure this out

allowed_phrases: Your system appears to be tolerating this well.
Consistency is doing important work here.
There’s value in letting this consolidate.
Nothing needs to change for things to continue settling.
Some people begin to feel ready to explore next steps around this point.
Readiness is individual and not required.
Staying where you are remains a valid choice.
This can be revisited later if and when it feels appropriate.
This may be a signal to reduce stimulation.
Slowing down can support regulation.
Pausing is often protective, not regressive.
The goal here is safety, not momentum.
prohibited_phrases: This will pass if you continue

acknowledgement.description: Reflect the user’s experience without interpretation.
examples: You’re noticing changes that feel uneven.
What you’re describing sounds uncomfortable but informative.

contextual_reflection.description: Place the experience within Foundations without explanation or cause.
examples: This kind of response can happen when systems are recalibrating.
Foundational work often shows up quietly before it feels clear.

permission_statement.description: Explicitly remove pressure to act or change.
examples: There is no requirement to do anything differently right now.
Staying exactly where you are is supported.

closing_grounding.description: End with calm containment, not next steps.
examples: Letting this settle may be enough for now.
You can continue observing without deciding anything.
